Summary: The module defines a test suite that validates the behavior of older Arkouda input/output functions across multiple data types and file formats, checking that they still operate correctly and handle edge cases.

Business intent: To safeguard backward compatibility for users relying on legacy I/O APIs, catch regressions after code changes, and ensure data integrity when saving/loading with deprecated paths.

Keywords: list.
